name: Nimble Navigator
description:
You're a bee! Pollinate the flowers before the snails eat them all!

Navigate your way through the greenhouse and pollinate as many plants as you can. But don't let the snails eat your flowers!

Fly into your buds to make your flowers bloom. Fill your bloom meter to win!

Fly into the snails to temporarily disable them, so they stop eating your flowers. An empty bloom meter means you lose!

Transform the dull, drab garden into a world of colour!
